'''Haleth''' is a [[Rohirrim|boy]] of [[Rohan]] who was the son of [[Háma]]. Haleth was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Calum Gittins]], though his lines were dubbed by an unknown actor.

==History==
After the death of his father, Haleth took up the sword in the [[Battle of the Hornburg|defence]] of the [[Hornburg]]. He was frightened, but [[Aragorn]] talked some courage into him.
